channel.title: LunarIsle - You Don't Know What You're Missing!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/images/logo.png[/img] [IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/Information.png[/img][/CENTER]
[URL=http://lunarisle.com/play/index.html]Click To Play WebClient[/URL] [URL=http://lunarisle.com/play/client.jar]Click To Download[/URL] [URL=http://lunarisle.com/forum/register.php]Click To Register On Forums[/URL] [URL=http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=up&server=5.39.103.110]Click To Vote[/URL]
LunarIsle is a 317 based server loading 508+ data, We strive to be a huge success. I first started here at MoparScape in 2006 and have run many servers now. LunarIsle started out in 2006 as the name "iHaxx" and closed in 2009, In 2012 we re-opened the server under the name of LunarIsle. Our server has a fantastic economy with plenty to do! Read on for more information.
Main Staff - Diesel (Main Owner + Developer) - Liam (Co-Owner)
Moderators -Kaamea -Jake
[b]We Need More![/b]
[CENTER][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/Features.png[/img][/CENTER]
- All Weapon Specials 100% - Overloads 100% - Vote For Cash And Points - Flawless Switching - 508+ Data - Loads Of Bosses - Quick Prayer / Curses - Donator Icon Support - No Lag - 64GB Dedicated Server - Custom Interfaces - Symbols Support (<>^\/) - Superb Graphics - Player Clipping - NPC Clipping - Info In Quest Tab - Lottery System - Pickpocketing - Fantastic Skilling Area - Skillcapes With Emotes 100% --- SO MUCH MORE!
[CENTER] Media [IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/DefenceEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/FarmingEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/FireMakingEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/FishingEmote.png[/img] [IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/FletchingEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/HerbloreEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/HitPointEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/MagicEmote.png[/img] [IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/MiningEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/PrayerEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/RangeEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/RuneCraftEmote.png[/img] [IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/SmithingEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/StrengthEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/ThievingEmote.png[/img][IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/WoodCuttingEmote.png[/img] [IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/DitchJump.png[/img] [IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/HandCannon.png[/img] [IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/new3.png[/img] [IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/Rushing.png[/img] [IMG]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/Claws.png[/img]
MORE COMING SOON..[/CENTER]
I hope to see some users join and would appreciate any comments & suggestions, Please keep sly remarks to yourselves :)
Kind Regards, Diesel
